revised_title: Convergent Liouville-Green Expansions for Second-Order Linear Differential Equations
tldr: The authors develop a method to obtain convergent Liouville-Green expansions for solutions of second-order linear differential equations with a large parameter. They apply this method to obtain convergent expansions for modified Bessel functions of large order, improving upon existing asymptotic expansions. The study uses a combination of Gevrey-type estimates, integral equation methods, and Laplace transforms to analyze the equations and their solutions.
